Description_lang: Ignites an enemy, inflicting $s1 Fire damage and an additional $s2 Fire damage every $t2 sec. for $d. When Cinders is removed, a pool of flames is created at the target's location. The pool inflicts $139836s2 Fire damage every $139835t1 sec. to all enemies within $139836A1 yards.
AuraDescription_lang: Inflicts $w2 Fire damage every $t2 sec.Melts any nearby Icy Ground.Pool of Cinders created when removed.
